holidays.title: Armed Forces Day (U.K.)
holidays.description: Show your gratitude and admiration for the U.K. armed forces today.

holidays.title: Eid-e-Ghadir
holidays.description: Eid-e-Ghadir is a day of celebration and remembrance for Shia Muslims all over the world.

holidays.title: Farmer Day
holidays.description: Join us as we thank Peru's farmers for keeping Peruvian markets well-stocked.

holidays.title: Holy Spirit Monday
holidays.description: Today, the faithful celebrate the descension of the Holy Spirit.

holidays.title: International Fairy Day
holidays.description: Time to fill the day with the same enchantment as those of the fairies.

holidays.title: International St. Johns Day
holidays.description: Sing the hymns and praise the Lord as we celebrate St. John the Baptist.

holidays.title: Inti Raymi
holidays.description: Let's join the residents to celebrate a pivotal aspect of their Incan heritage.

holidays.title: Jani
holidays.description: Let's celebrate Jani, the festival that combines culture and nature in the spirit of the Midsummer.

holidays.title: Midsummer
holidays.description: Midsummer is a time of pure merriment with food, drinking, and dancing!

holidays.title: National Le Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore the origins of the name, Le, and its meaning.

holidays.title: National Pralines Day
holidays.description: Pralines are a smooth and sweet treat made with nuts, sugar, and sometimes cream.

holidays.title: National Relationship Equity Day
holidays.description: Drop your stereotypes, adopt this new perception, and give your partner equitable treatment.

holidays.title: Orthodox Pentecost Monday
holidays.description: Today is the day to prepare a lavish feast to honor the Holy Spirit.

holidays.title: St John's Day (Venezuela)
holidays.description: On St. John’s Day, expect prayer, song, and dancing the night away.

holidays.title: Swim a Lap Day
holidays.description: Swimming is the only sport that can help save a life, dive in to learn more.

holidays.title: Upcycling Day
holidays.description: To avoid wasting items, make a list of everything that can be reused or upcycled.

holidays.title: Lionel Messi’s Birthday
holidays.description: The best is yet to come for this talented, record-breaking soccer player.

holidays.title: Mindy Kaling’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mindy Kaling went from being an in-demand writer to one of the most unique comedic voices.

holidays.title: Stassi Schroeder’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is impossible for this amazing multi-talented star of the small screen.

holidays.title: Tana Mongeau’s Birthday
holidays.description: Never has there been a sweeter sight than a bikini-clad Tana Mongeau basking under the Miami sun.
